attributes.value:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs-f2.SocialNetwork:'
var sections = {
'GAD7':[
'GAD_NERV_COF2',
'GAD_STPWOR_COF2',
'GAD_WORRTO_COF2',
'GAD_RELAX_COF2',
'GAD_RESTLS_COF2',
'GAD_ANNOY_COF2',
'GAD_AFRAID_COF2',
'GAD_TOTAL2_COF2'],
'SN':[
'SN_LIVHF2_NB_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M2R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M2S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M2A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M3R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M3S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M3A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M4R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M4S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M4A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M5R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M5S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M5A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M6R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M6S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M6A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M7R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M7S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M7A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M8R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M8S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M8A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M9R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M9S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M9A_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M10R_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M10S_COF2',
'SN_LIVH_M10A_COF2',
'SN_CHILDSTP_COF2',
'SN_DGHTRLIV_COF2',
'SN_SONLIV_COF2',
'SN_SEECHILD_COF2',
'SN_SIBLIV_COF2',
'SN_SEESIB_COF2',
'SN_RELLIV_COF2',
'SN_SEEREL_COF2',
'SN_FRND_COF2',
'SN_SEEFRND_COF2',
'SN_SEENEIBR_COF2',
'SN_CHILDSTP2_COF2',
'SN_CHILDSTPNEW_COF2'],
'SPA':[
'SPA_SOAC_COF2',
'SPA_OUTS_COF2',
'SPA_CHRCH_COF2',
'SPA_SPORT_COF2',
'SPA_EDUC_COF2',
'SPA_CLUB_COF2',
'SPA_NEIBR_COF2',
'SPA_VOLUN_COF2',
'SPA_OTACT_COF2',
'SPA_MORAC_COF2',
'SPA_PREVAC_COF2',
'SPA_COHES_COF2'],
'SSA':[
'SSA_CONFBED_COF2',
'SSA_NDTLK_COF2',
'SSA_CRISIS_COF2',
'SSA_TYTDR_COF2',
'SSA_SHLOV_COF2',
'SSA_GOODT_COF2',
'SSA_INFO_COF2',
'SSA_CONFID_COF2',
'SSA_HUGS_COF2',
'SSA_RELAX_COF2',
'SSA_MEALS_COF2',
'SSA_ADVCE_COF2',
'SSA_MINDOFF_COF2',
'SSA_CHORES_COF2',
'SSA_SHFEAR_COF2',
'SSA_SUGG_COF2',
'SSA_ENJOY_COF2',
'SSA_PROBLM_COF2',
'SSA_LOVU_COF2',
'SSA_PET_COF2']
}

var skip = []
if($(stage+'QuestionnaireRun.version').any('4.0').value()) {
  skip.push('GAD7')
}

var str = []
for(var key in sections) {
  if(-1 != skip.indexOf(key)) {
    str.push(null)
    continue
  }  
  var rcount = 0
  var qcount = 0
  var arr = sections[key]
  for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    var j = $(stage + arr[i])
    if(j.isNull().value()) {
      continue
    }  
    qcount++
    rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0
  }
  if(0 == qcount) {
    str.push(null)
  } else {
    str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount)
  }
}
newSequence(str, 'decimal')
